main event: A flashing red light was observed for approximately 3 minutes in Lowell, Michigan on 8th September 1955, before fading into the weather.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for around 3 minutes, suggesting a sustained observation of the object.
The course of the object was noted as straight and level, indicating a possible aircraft sighting.
The document was part of Project Blue Book, a U.S. Air Force program for the investigation of UFOs.
The observer was watching for aircraft when the flashing red light was spotted, adding to the credibility of the observation.
The conclusions section of the report did not provide a definitive explanation for the observed phenomenon.
witnesses: Mr. ---GHA, a contractor from Lowell, Michigan
